attributes.action: Scrap the Single Room Rent restriction within the Housing Benefit Regulations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government recently introduced legislation to prevent discrimination on the grounds of someone's age, But the government itself still forces local authorities to restrict someone's Housing Benefit if they are single, under 25 and renting a property on their own. This flies in the face of the governments own legislation and urge the government to scrap the Single Room Rent restriction
